thread.title: Mike Van Kooten
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by Mike Van Kooten

author: Mike Van Kooten
title: Mike Van Kooten
text:
Your listings for cubic meters are different for every bag, some are for both bags combined and others are for each bag separate.
Makes it hard when you are looking at a large bag and it has less cubic meters of storage then the small bags, but with the help of the chat line, I was able to purchase the bags I wanted.
Bags look great, like the quality, and the they fit the style of my M90, also like the fact that they are manufactured with locks.
